page.title: 04A DAY IN MY FAMILY LIFE
page.content: My name is Louise Illingworth.I live in Whickham.My day started at 8:10a.m. I woke up and felt very tired.When I got up,I got ready and sorted my things out.I went down for my breakfast,which was frosties and coffee.Dad lay in bed for a while,but Mam and Mark got up with me.Dad and Mark were going to Whickham,so I went with them.When we came back,Dad and Mark got their sweets ready for the Cup Final between Everton and Man.United.Mam and Iwent to the town.We went into Geordie Girl and got some clothes then we set off to meet grandma and Aunty Janet.When we met them,we set off for Dance City.To our disappointment,the lessons had been cancelled.Mam and I set off to a cafe.A short while later we looked in some shops.We had tired and sore E
